short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly navigate between different Mendix sources and landing pages. Also emulate different device profiles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mendix Navigator is designed to streamline the development and testing process for Mendix developers by providing a user-friendly way to switch between different device profiles, apps, and landing pages. 

Here's how Mendix Navigator can enhance your development experience:

- Effortlessly switch between device profiles: Select your desired device profile with ease. You even have the option to maintain the same landing page while switching profiles.

- Direct access to your Mendix environments: Save time navigating between different environments by opening them directly with the right device profile and landing page.

- Open different local Mendix apps: Quickly navigate between different locally running Mendix applications with just a few clicks.

- Add custom landing pages: Enhance your debugging process by adding frequently visited landing pages for quicker access.

If you find this tool helpful, please consider leaving a review!
